Name: LLP010 Check List has Values
Output_template: {"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","query":"select NoAddressesRtn, IF(NoAddressesRtn>0,{postcode_search},'') as postcode_search_after, IF(NoAddressesRtn<1, IF({postcode_search} IS NULL, 'You need to provide a search value in the Postcode / Road search', IF({subParam} like '%oNman%' or {subParam} like '%oNuA%', 'No matching addresses found please use different Postcode / Road search', 'No matching addresses found please use different Postcode / Road search or use the address is not in the list option') ), IF(NoAddressesRtn>300, 'There are more results than can be displayed, if your address is not displayed try including a flat or house number/name.', '') ) as adMsg FROM (select COUNT(uprn) as NoAddressesRtn FROM llpgcache WHERE ( (REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ','')) OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search},'%')) ) AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5 AND postcode != '') as SubSel","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}
